Articles.Content:
Hey! I'm working on EngineLight compatibility with RealPlumes, and i have decided that the best method to integrate it is copying the Engine particle color, and applying it to my light.

The problem is that EngineModules do not seem to have any particle system, and i'm not sure where the engine particle system is at.

Thank you in advance!
the EFFECTS{} node should have those at the PARTICLE_PREFAB node but i from there it might be a problem to actually get the particle prefab (i wouldnt know i havnt tried to do that yet)
RealPlume uses SmokeScreen particles anyway, not PARTICLE_PREFAB.
